Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 Firefox/3.6.13 (.NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; .NET4.0C; .NET CLR 3.0.30729)

1) Each time EXIT is chosen instead of 'SAVE AND EXIT', 'check to remember' does not retain the choice to Exit Only.

2) Tools/Options/Tabs/Warn Me When Closing Multiple Tabs - when this is checked, Firefox arbitrarily unchecks this option.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
Bug # 1. This happens when Firefox has crashed, even though previously I have chosen EXIT (not chosen SAVE & EXIT)

Bug # 2. Cannot decipher what causes the Tab to become unchecked.  Sometimes it lasts weeks before becoming unchecked.
3.
Actual Results:  
As I have approx 8 windows open at any time, and 1 of them has about 22 TABs open, reopening all these windows/tabs causes chaos as some require logins, etc.
